description:
Newcomer Idol Tsu Terakado and Boy Band “Hansamu” leader Goemon’s passionate affair revealed! – The news plunges Shinpachi and the fan club members into the depths of depression. Gintoki is also stunned after learning that his favorite weather reporter Ms. Ketsuno is married. But while Kagura smirks at the two losers, Otsu shows up at the Odd jobs office.  Since the discovery of the relationship, Otsu has received numerous threatening letters and has come for Gintoki’s help, but she has no clue as to who the culprit is. Shinpachi is determined to protect Otsu with all his might by staying close to her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aidoru Datte Hobo Omaera to Onaji Koto Yattenda yo
Even Teen Idols Act Like You Guys
Pop-Idole tun das Gleiche wie ihr!
アイドルだってほぼお前らと同じことやってんだよ
